In a crowded marketplace, product packaging is often the first thing that catches a customer’s eye. The right packaging design doesn’t just contain a product it communicates a brand’s identity, values, and story. Whether you’re a startup looking to make a splash or an established brand aiming for a revamp, finding the best package design agency in Bangalore, India can make all the difference.

We’ve rounded up the top 10 packaging design companies in Bangalore and across India to help you choose the perfect partner for your packaging needs. These agencies specialize in creating innovative, eye-catching, and functional packaging that stands out on the shelves.

1. Brandemic – Leading Package Design Agency in Bangalore

Brandemic has established itself as one of the top packaging design companies in Bangalore and India. Known for their creative flair and unique approach to branding and packaging, Brandemic offers tailor-made solutions that align with a brand’s core values. Their designs are not only visually appealing but also functional, ensuring that products look as good on the shelves as they do online.

From high-end luxury packaging design to sustainable and eco-friendly options, Brandemic has worked with a wide array of clients. Their holistic approach to design ensures that each package reflects the product’s essence and brand promise.

Services Offered:

  • Creative Packaging Design
  • Custom Packaging Solutions
  • Product Packaging Design in Bangalore
  • Brand Packaging Design Agency Services
  • Sustainable Packaging Options

 

Location: Bangalore, India

2. Confetti Design Studio – Packaging Design Experts in Bangalore

Confetti Design Studio is a top-rated packaging design agency based in Bangalore. Known for their project management and responsive communication, they specialize in creating packaging that resonates with consumers while maintaining functionality. Confetti Design Studio’s diverse portfolio includes work with consumer products and luxury goods, and they are particularly noted for enhancing the unboxing experience through creative designs.

Services Offered:

  • Branding
  • Packaging Design for Amazon Compliant Products
  • Packaging Testing
  • Custom Packaging Solutions

Location: Bangalore, India

3. PEPERSALT Design – Creative Packaging Solutions

PEPERSALT Design, based in Bangalore, provides cutting-edge packaging solutions with a focus on branding and user experience design. They work with a variety of industries and offer eco-friendly packaging options that align with modern sustainability goals. PEPERSALT is known for crafting designs that stand out in competitive markets, helping brands communicate their identity effectively through packaging.

Services Offered:

  • Brand Packaging Design
  • Custom Packaging Solutions
  • Eco-Friendly Packaging Design
  • Retail Packaging Design


Location: Bangalore, India

4. Studio Kukumbar – Packaging Design with a Unique Touch

Founded in 2022, Studio Kukumbar focuses on creative and minimalist designs, with a specialty in branding and packaging design. Though small, their attention to detail has garnered them respect in the industry, providing designs that appeal to both the brand and its audience. Their work includes creating visually compelling packaging that tells a brand’s story.

Services Offered:

  • Custom Packaging Design
  • Logo and Graphic Design
  • Web Design and Branding Solutions

 

Location: Bangalore, India

5. ACD Brand Studio – Innovative Packaging Design

ACD Brand Studio is another highly respected name in the packaging design world, offering custom solutions that reflect a brand’s core values. They emphasize creativity and innovation, ensuring that their designs stand out on retail shelves. Whether it’s luxury packaging or everyday product design, ACD Brand Studio delivers with a touch of sophistication.

Services Offered:

  • Custom Packaging Design
  • Branding Solutions
  • Web and Graphic Design


Location: Bangalore, India

6. Tea & Oranges Design – Bold Packaging for Modern Brands

Tea & Oranges Design is a branding and communication agency that offers cutting-edge packaging design services. Based in Bangalore, they are known for their bold and creative approach. Their designs often reflect a brand’s adventurous spirit and aim to create an immediate connection with consumers.

Services Offered:

  • Creative Packaging Design
  • Branding and Visual Identity
  • Custom Packaging Solutions


Location: Bangalore, India

7. 99x Studio – Contemporary Packaging for Every Product

99x Studio is known for their fresh approach to packaging design. They focus on user experience and usability, ensuring that the designs they create are not only beautiful but also functional. Their packaging design services cater to various industries, ensuring that products are both well-packaged and appealing.

Services Offered:

  • Packaging Design
  • User Experience Design
  • Custom Packaging Solutions


Location: Bangalore, India

8. Parentheses – Crafting Unique Packaging Designs

Parentheses is a design studio that crafts packaging with a creative and artistic touch. Their packaging designs are known for being sleek and modern, while also being functional and tailored to their clients’ needs. Parentheses excels at helping brands create memorable unboxing experiences.

Services Offered:

  • Product Packaging Design
  • Sustainable Packaging Solutions
  • Custom Packaging Design


Location: Bangalore, India

9. Fellow Studio – Creative Packaging Design for Modern Brands

Fellow Studio focuses on creating packaging that connects with today’s customers while aiming to build long-term brand icons. They design packaging that integrates branding and storytelling with creative visual elements. With a focus on detail, their designs help brands stand out on the shelves.

Services Offered:

  • Packaging Design
  • Branding Solutions
  • Web and Graphic Design


Location: Bangalore, India

10. Idaete Innovation LLP – Tailored Packaging Design Services

Idaete Innovation LLP offers tailored branding and packaging solutions, designed to help businesses stand out in competitive markets. Their designs are characterized by a blend of modern aesthetics and functional integrity, making sure that their packaging solutions not only appeal visually but also enhance user experience.

Services Offered:

  • Branding and Packaging Design
  • Graphic Design Solutions
  • Product Packaging Design


Location: Bangalore, India

Conclusion

A great packaging design can make all the difference when it comes to product success. From luxury packaging design agencies to creative packaging design firms, the above list features the best package design companies in Bangalore and India. Whether you’re looking for custom packaging, eco-friendly solutions, or a complete brand overhaul, these agencies have the experience and creativity to deliver top-notch results. Take the next step in building your brand by choosing the right packaging design agency and watch your products fly off the shelves!

FAQ

Why is packaging design important for my brand?

Packaging design is crucial because it serves as the first point of contact between your product and potential customers. A well-designed package can attract attention, communicate your brand’s identity, convey product details, and influence purchasing decisions. It helps differentiate your product from competitors and creates a memorable brand experience.

What should I look for when choosing a packaging design agency?

When selecting a packaging design agency, consider the following factors:

  • Their portfolio and past work in your industry
  • The agency’s expertise in both aesthetics and functionality
  • Experience with sustainable and eco-friendly packaging
  • Customization and ability to align with your brand values
  • Client testimonials and success stories
  • The agency’s understanding of your target audience and market trends

How long does it take to complete a packaging design project?

The timeline for completing a packaging design project can vary depending on the complexity of the design, revisions, and the agency’s workload. Typically, it can take anywhere from 2-6 weeks for initial concepts to final execution. Make sure to discuss project timelines with the agency upfront to align expectations.

Can these agencies handle both small and large-scale packaging projects?

Yes, the packaging design agencies listed above work with businesses of all sizes, from startups to established brands. Whether you need packaging for a single product or an entire product line, these agencies have the expertise to deliver customized solutions tailored to your needs.

Do these agencies offer sustainable and eco-friendly packaging options?

Many of the top packaging design agencies in Bangalore and India offer sustainable packaging solutions. Brandemic, Orangemantra, Ekommerce360, and Blueslag Technologies are some examples of agencies that specialize in eco-friendly packaging, helping businesses reduce their environmental impact.
